snippet.title: Bionicle The game official trailer (50fps reupload)
snippet.description:
Darkus1155 uploaded this once, but because it got removed for some reason, I decided to reupload the HQ version from Bionicle Mask Of Light DVD. This trailer can also be found from VHS version.

From all this game's trailers, this and the first three tech demo ones are the most believable trailers. Even though all footage is taken from WIP state. And wow how 50fps made this look beautiful!

The game itself ain't too well received though, mostly because of being short, noncanonical and nutshelled. However, those eight levels were long and difficult, like in case of Earthworm Jim 1-2.

Btw, who disliked those Legoland promos right after uploading?

(c) 2003 EA/The Lego Group
